children.subject:
Thanks for the report, we will investigate.  In the meantime, please use the other login servers (ashby, cedar, derby, etc.) for working remotely.

Finsen Chiu

IT Manager 
Instructional Support Group 
Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences 
College of Engineering 
UC Berkeley 
378 Cory Hall, MC 1770

Solano & Oxford have been down for a while

history.content:
[Update Monday 10/28]

Campus announced that daytime classes are canceled for Monday 10/28.  Students are asked to stay away from Campus buildings until further announcements.  However, the Moffitt Library is open today if students need a space to work, and study.

The following EECS machines are available for remote access if students need to complete work remotely:

CS servers:

ashby

cedar

cory

derby

gilman 

hearst

ward

EDA servers:

eda-1

eda-2

hpse-9

For instructors prepping EECS course work:

c111-11

---------------------------

Due to the impending PG&E power outage this weekend, Campus will switch to co-generation power starting at noon this Saturday 10/26.
With the switchover to co-generation power, we are planning to keep the following essential instructional services available online:
- Course websites
- Course VMs
- UNIX login servers (ashby, cedar, derby, gilman, hearst, oxford, solano, ward)
- EDA apps servers
For safety reasons, Campus Administration has asked students to stay away from Campus for the duration of the outage.  Access to Soda Hall, and Cory Hall will be restricted to critical facilities personnel only.  Computer lab machines will be powered off during the outage to help reduce power consumption.
In the event that load needs to be further reduced on the co-generation power plant, we will shut down the above services if necessary based upon direction from Campus Administration.
Thank you for your understanding.
Finsen Chiu
IT Manager 
Instructional Support Group 
Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences 
College of Engineering 
UC Berkeley 
378 Cory Hall, MC 1770 
inst@eecs.berkeley.edu
(510) 643-6141
